about_the_game:
Story

Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.


Game features

  • The unique experience of Point & Click adventure,
  • The game is entirely made of paper crafts to get the most reliable, fantastic world possible,
  • Atmospheric, captivating music
  • Puzzles are part of the paper world,
  • The story is told through animation and sounds, without dialogues.

About game

The game was created by one person and is inspired by old classic games such as Play with Me: Escape room, The Neverhood, Machinarium, Samorost Botanicula, Play with Me 2: On the other side and fascination with illusions.


PS. I can't tell you more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu, supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000

name: Botty: Paper tales Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)
